related.meaning: jubah mandi, kimono musim panas kasual
makan siang harga tetap, paket makan, makan malam

lessons.japanese: 衣食住は生活の基本です。
lessons.indonesian: Food, clothing and shelter are the basis of life.

lessons.japanese: 私達が生きていくためには衣食住が必要です。
lessons.indonesian: We need food, clothes and a home in order to live.
